alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 9:41PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Indiana, including the following counties, Fountain, Parke and Vermillion. * WHEN...Until 345 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 941 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Newport, Dana, Kingman, Lodi and Yeddo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
